meaningMnemonic: The kanji for <kanji>death</kanji> and <kanji>body</kanji> put together make for a <vocabulary>dead body</vocabulary>. Hopefully you don't have to use or see this vocab too much.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
